title: Curly Brackets / Braces
body:
by **antarctica365247**: 
Hello, i would very much like to use your new GO language, but as i saw a python
tutorial from google yesterday, I got the idea that getting rid of those curly brackets
/ braces would be an excellent idea as you have the indentation anyway. And now as I
look at GO I see the same problem again. I would really appreciate your language, if you
could maybe integrate this solution (and maybe more from python) into GO. So, please get
rid of the curly brackets / braces and i will use GO forever.
